verses.verse: <S%H2803>Think<s%> you <S%H2063>this<s%> to be <S%H4941>right,<s%> that you <S%H559>said,<s%> My <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> is <S%H3254>more<s%> than <S%H410>God's?<s%>
For you <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H5532>advantage<s%> will it be to you? and, <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H3276>profit<s%> shall I have, if I be cleansed from my <S%H2403>sin?<s%>
I will <S%H7725>answer<s%> <S%H4405><s%> you, and your <S%H7453>companions<s%> with you.
<S%H5027>Look<s%> to the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and <S%H7200>see;<s%> and <S%H7789>behold<s%> the <S%H7834>clouds<s%> which are <S%H1361>higher<s%> than you.

<S%H518>If<s%> you <S%H2398>sin,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H6466>do<s%> you against him? or if your <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> be <S%H7231>multiplied,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> you to him?
<S%H518>If<s%> you be <S%H6663>righteous,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> you him? <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H3947>receives<s%> he of your <S%H3027>hand?<s%>
Your <S%H7562>wickedness<s%> may hurt a <S%H376>man<s%> as you are; and your <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> may profit the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man.<s%>

By reason of the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H6217>oppressions<s%> they make the oppressed to <S%H2199>cry:<s%> they <S%H7768>cry<s%> out by reason of the <S%H2220>arm<s%> of the <S%H7227>mighty.<s%>
But <S%H3808>none<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H335>Where<s%> is <S%H433>God<s%> my <S%H6213>maker,<s%> who <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H2158>songs<s%> in the <S%H3915>night;<s%>
Who <S%H502>teaches<s%> us more than the <S%H929>beasts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and makes us <S%H2449>wiser<s%> than the <S%H5775>fowls<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven?<s%>
<S%H8033>There<s%> they <S%H6817>cry,<s%> but <S%H3808>none<s%> gives <S%H6030>answer,<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of <S%H7451>evil<s%> men.
<S%H637>Although<s%> <S%H3588><s%> you <S%H559>say<s%> you shall not <S%H7789>see<s%> him, yet <S%H1779>judgment<s%> is <S%H6440>before<s%> him; therefore <S%H2342>trust<s%> you in him.
But <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> it is not so, he has <S%H6485>visited<s%> in his <S%H639>anger;<s%> yet he <S%H3045>knows<s%> it not in <S%H3966>great<s%> <S%H6580>extremity:<s%>
